com.samsung.multiscreen

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.multiscreen.Device

  • public class Device
extends Object
    Encapsultes the device info for the underlying device backing a Service. Device information may be retrieved through the Service.getDeviceInfo(Result) method.
